import React from 'react'; import RecordScreen from './components/RecordScreen'; import RecordingsList from './components/RecordingsList'; import './App.css'; function App() { return (

MERN Screen Recorder

Record, preview, and manage your screen recordings

How to Use

1

Adjust recording length and audio settings according to your preferences

2

Click "Start Recording" and grant screen sharing permissions when prompted

3

Select the screen or application window you want to record

4

Click "Stop Recording" when finished, or wait for the recording to automatically stop

5

Preview, download, or upload your recording as needed

Note: Screen recording requires a secure context (HTTPS) in production, but works on localhost for development.

MERN Screen Recorder Application - Built with React, Express, and SQLite

); } export default App;
